channel.title: ethylene response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ethylene response on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcKUP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ach02g251101.2 Gene Symbol: AcKUP2 Gene Name: K+ transporter KT/HAK/KUP 2 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-induced potassium transporter AcKUP2 gene is involved in kiwifruit postharvest ripening.

item.title: AdNAC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc26399 Gene Symbol: AdNAC2 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: AdNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc13705 Gene Symbol: AdNAC72 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: AhIPH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Arahy.5BLU0Q Gene Symbol: AhIPH1 Gene Name: inhibition of peanut hypocotyl elongation 1 Genome: Genome assembly arahy.

item.title: BcERF070
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraC07g014310 Gene Symbol: BcERF070 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 070 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: Ethylene responsive factor 070 (BcERF070) is important in flowering.

item.title: BnERF2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnERF2.4 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like (ERF2.

item.title: BoERF1L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bol028757 Gene Symbol: BoERF1L Gene Name: Genome: “02-12” reference genome, version 1 Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Description: The ethylene response factor BoERF1L represses the expression of Ms-cd1 by directly binding to its promoter.

item.title: CaPIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIF1 Gene Name: Pathogen-Induced Factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A plant EPF-type zinc-finger protein, CaPIF1, involved in defence against pathogens.

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: ClAGO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G079510 Gene Symbol: ClAGO1 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClAGO1 and ClAGO5 expression levels were highly induced by CGMMV infection.

item.title: ClAGO5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G012980 Gene Symbol: ClAGO5 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClAGO1 and ClAGO5 expression levels were highly induced by CGMMV infection.

item.title: CmERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERF4 Gene Name: ERF VIIIa 4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: A group VIIIa ethylene-responsive factor, CmERF4, negatively regulates waterlogging tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmERFI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C002624 Gene Symbol: CmERFI-2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor I-2 Genome: melon genome database (http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: CsAP2-09
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsAP2-09 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Demonstrated that overexpression of an Xcc-inducible apetala 2/ethylene response factor encoded by Citrus sinensis, CsAP2-09, enhances CBC resistance.

item.title: CsEIL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G004610 Gene Symbol: CsEIL3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A CsEIL3-CsARN6.

item.title: CsERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsERF2, an ethylene response factor, plays a role in leaf variegation.

item.title: CsERF31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G135120 Gene Symbol: CsERF31 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR31 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A positive feedback loop mediated by CsERF31 initiates female cucumber flower development.

item.title: DkMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMYB14 is a bifunctional transcription factor that regulates the accumulation of proanthocyanidin in persimmon fruit.

item.title: DUO-B1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1B02G326500 Gene Symbol: DUO-B1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: ENOD93

item.title: GhAPX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX1 Gene Name: cytosolic ascorbate peroxidase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) cytosolic APX1 (GhAPX1) was identified to be highly accumulated during cotton fibre elongation by proteomic analysis.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: GhERF108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G13101 Gene Symbol: GhERF108 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor ERF108 interacts with AUXIN RESPONSE FACTORs to mediate cotton fiber secondary cell wall biosynthesis.

item.title: GhERF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF6 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton Major Latex Protein 28 (GhMLP28) Functions as a Positive Regulator of the Ethylene Responsive Factor 6 (GhERF6) in Defense against Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhERF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G1817 Gene Symbol: GhERF9 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 9 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we have demonstrated that one of the ERF TFs in cotton, GhERF9, exerts a regulatory role in enhancing the expression of GhHAK5a by binding to its promoter region.

item.title: GhLYI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G0312 Gene Symbol: GhLYI Gene Name: LINT YIELD INCREASING Genome: eference genome of G.

item.title: GhMYB108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB108 Gene Name: defense-related MYB 108 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton MYB108 forms a positive feedback regulation loop with CML11 and participates in the defense response against Verticillium dahliae infection.

item.title: GmERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G123100 Gene Symbol: GmERF1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors GmERF1 and GmWRKY6 synergistically regulate low phosphorus tolerance in soybean.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GUDK

item.title: HbPLT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbPLT1 Gene Name: putative polyol transporter protein 1 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: Screening a latex-derived cDNA library using polyol transporter-specific probes, two full-length cDNAs were isolated, and named HbPLT1 and HbPLT2 (for Hevea brasiliensis polyol transporter 1 and 2, respectively).

item.title: HbPLT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbPLT2 Gene Name: putative polyol transporter protein 2 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: Screening a latex-derived cDNA library using polyol transporter-specific probes, two full-length cDNAs were isolated, and named HbPLT1 and HbPLT2 (for Hevea brasiliensis polyol transporter 1 and 2, respectively).

item.title: HvRAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvRAF Gene Name: root abundant factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley ERF-type transcription factor HvRAF confers enhanced pathogen resistance and salt tolerance in Arabidopsis.

item.title: LeACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g095080.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeACS2 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Turnover of LeACS2, a wound-inducible 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid synthase in tomato, is regulated by phosphorylation/dephosphorylation.

item.title: LeEix2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeEix2 Gene Name: receptor-like protein EIX2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Endosomal signaling of the tomato leucine-rich repeat receptor-like protein LeEix2.

item.title: LeERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeERF2 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional Regulation of the Ethylene Response Factor LeERF2 in the Expression of Ethylene Biosynthesis Genes Controls Ethylene Production in Tomato and Tobacco.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdERF1B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The ethylene response factor MdERF1B regulates anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: PacCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PbEIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbEIL1 Gene Name: ethylene-insensitive 3-like Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbEIL1 acts upstream of PbCysp1 to regulate ovule senescence in seedless pear.

item.title: PhBPBT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhBPBT Gene Name: benzoyl CoA:benzyl alcohol/phenylethanol benzoyltransferase Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Tissue-specific PhBPBT expression is differentially regulated in response to endogenous ethylene.

item.title: PhERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhERF2 Gene Name: ethylene-responsive-element-binding factor 2 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: A petunia ethylene-responsive element binding factor, PhERF2, plays an important role in antiviral RNA silencing.

item.title: PhGRL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhGRL2 Gene Name: Green-ripe like protein 2 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: PhGRL2 Protein, Interacting with PhACO1, Is Involved in Flower Senescence in the Petunia.

item.title: PhPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhPT1|PhPht1|1 Gene Name: phosphate transporter1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Ethylene regulates phosphorus remobilization and expression of a phosphate transporter (PhPT1|PhPht1|1) during petunia corolla senescence.

item.title: PpERF.A16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ppa008730m Gene Symbol: PpERF.A16 Gene Name: Genome: peach genome version 1.

item.title: PsAFB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsAFB6 Gene Name: TIR1/AFB 6 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Pericarp PsAFB6 expression was suppressed by seeds and increased in response to deseeding, and exogenous hormone treatments suggest that seed-derived auxin and deseeding-induced ethylene are involved in these responses, respectively.

item.title: PtoERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.008G166100 Gene Symbol: PtoERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The AP2/ERF transcription factor PtoERF15 confers drought tolerance via JA-mediated signaling in Populus.

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: PuWRKY31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuWRKY31 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 31 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: The expression of the transcription factor PuWRKY31 was higher in BNG fruit than in NG fruit, and was induced by sucrose treatment.

item.title: PvLOX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvLOX6 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 6 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Isolated the cDNA of a novel chloroplast-targeted Phaseolus vulgaris LOX, (PvLOX6).

item.title: PvMTF-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvMTF-1 Gene Name: METAL RESPONSE ELEMENT-BINDING TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Transcription Factors PvERF15 and PvMTF-1 Form a Cadmium Stress Transcriptional Pathway.

item.title: RcBROG
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RcBROG Gene Name: Black-spot Resistance Orphan Gene Genome: Species: Rosa chinensis Functional Descriptions: The Marssonina rosae effector MrSEP43 suppresses immunity in rose by targeting the orphan protein RcBROG.

item.title: Sl-ERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-ERF2 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Sl-ERF2, a Tomato Ethylene Response Factor Involved in Ethylene Response and Seed Germination.

item.title: SlEIL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g009170 Gene Symbol: SlEIL2 Gene Name: ETHYLENE-INSENSITIVE 3-LIKE 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: ETHYLENE-INSENSITIVE 3-LIKE 2 (SlEIL2) regulates β-carotene and ascorbic acid accumulation in tomatoes during ripening.

item.title: SlGRAS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g100200 Gene Symbol: SlGRAS4 Gene Name: GRAS transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlGRAS4 mediates a novel regulatory pathway promoting chilling tolerance in tomato.

item.title: SlJMJ3

item.title: SlMKK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlMKK2 Gene Name: Mitogen-activated protein kinase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlMKK2 and SlMKK4 contribute to disease resistance against Botrytis cinerea.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlMKK4 Gene Name: Mitogen-activated protein kinase 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlMKK2 and SlMKK4 contribute to disease resistance against Botrytis cinerea.

item.title: SmKSL1

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5D02G141900 Gene Symbol: TaCML36 Gene Name: calmodulin-like 36 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaCML36, a wheat calmodulin-like protein, positively participates in an immune response to Rhizoctonia cerealis.

item.title: TaEIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaEIL1 Gene Name: ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE3-LIKE1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: bread wheat ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE3-LIKE1 (TaEIL1), an ortholog of Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana) ETHYLENE INSENSITIVE3, negatively regulates bread wheat resistance against powdery mildew.

item.title: TaMED25-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMED25-A Gene Name: Mediator subunit 25 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Wheat Mediator Subunit TaMED25 Interacts with the Transcription Factor TaEIL1 to Negatively Regulate Disease Resistance against Powdery Mildew.

item.title: TaMED25-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMED25-B Gene Name: Mediator subunit 25 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Wheat Mediator Subunit TaMED25 Interacts with the Transcription Factor TaEIL1 to Negatively Regulate Disease Resistance against Powdery Mildew.

item.title: TaMED25-D

item.title: TaMKK5-6B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS6B02G379500 Gene Symbol: TaMKK5-6B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase TaMKK5 mediates immunity via the TaMKK5–TaMPK3–TaERF3 module.
